price: 51. Kaadu nummah Yalli xiibitak Nabii Ibraahimih Qunxa mariinol kay tirtoy sinam fan как seeca kaah necee, Nabii Muusaa kee Nabii Haaruunuk duma, kaadu nanu usuk woh cakkisitam aaxaguk sugne iyye.
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَآ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ رُشۡدَهُۥ مِن قَبۡلُ وَكُنَّا بِهِۦ عَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā ib'rāhīma rush'dahu min qablu wakunnā bihi ʿālimīna
